name: pac-environment
description: Pin and auto-apply Power Platform CLI profiles per VS Code workspace

commands.title: PAC Env: Apply Pinned Profile Now

pacEnv.profileName.description: The pac auth profile name to use for this workspace. If set, the extension will run 'pac auth select --name <profile>' on open.

pacEnv.autoApplyOnOpen.description: If true, auto-run 'pac auth select --name <profileName>' when the workspace opens.

pacEnv.readFromDotfile.description: If true, read a .pacenv file in the workspace root for a profile name if configuration is empty.
